playersRollAllDice.name: Players Roll All Dice
playersRollAllDice.hint: Enable the 'Players Roll All Dice' variant rule. NPC attacks become player armor saves, and NPC saves become player overcome checks. Requires Target Helper to be enabled.
playersRollAllDice.requiresTargetHelper: Enable Target Helper first to use this setting.

pradStrictDCs.name: Strict DC Mode (Exact Probabilities)
pradStrictDCs.hint: Use DC = 12 + modifier instead of the default 11 + modifier. The default (+11) gives players a small 5% edge; strict mode (+12) exactly preserves the original hit/miss/crit probabilities. Only applies when Players Roll All Dice is enabled.
